result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for providing utilities and functionalities for collecting, observing, and pushing metrics using Prometheus for monitoring services.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating different aspects of metrics handling such as collection, observation, pushing, and server management, all centered around Prometheus.

pkg/metrics/metric.go.purpose: This file provides metrics collection utilities using Prometheus for monitoring services.

pkg/metrics/ops.go.purpose: This file provides utility functions for observing and measuring execution time of operations using Prometheus metrics.

pkg/metrics/pusher.go.purpose: This file implements a metrics pusher that sends metrics to a Prometheus push gateway.

pkg/metrics/registry.go.purpose: Manages Prometheus metric collectors with caching and registration functionality.

pkg/metrics/server.go.purpose: This file implements a metrics server using Prometheus for monitoring HTTP server metrics.
